alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 3:18AM EST until December 23 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level is expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the Maryland counties of Queen Anne`s, Talbot and Caroline. * WHEN...Until 9:00 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in bayside communities and along tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Eastern Bay at Claiborne MLLW Categories - Minor 3.4 ft, Moderate 4.4 ft, Major 5.4 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.7 ft, Moderate 2.7 ft, Major 3.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 23/03 AM 3.4 1.7 2.8 Minor 23/06 PM 4.3 2.6 3.0 Minor 24/05 PM 1.8 0.1 0.3 None 25/05 AM 0.7 -1.0 0.1 None 25/06 PM 1.5 -0.2 0.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
